# iosxr_extcommunity_evpn_link_bandwidth_set (Data Source)

This data source can read the Extcommunity EVPN Link Bandwidth Set configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_extcommunity_evpn_link_bandwidth_set" "example" {
  set_name = "EVPN1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `set_name` (String) Set name

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `rpl` (String) Configures an extended community EVPN link bandwidth set
